issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

components.name: Titanium SDK & CLI
components.description: Please enter tickets related to the MobileSDK here.

fields.description:
I am trying to build a running app, on new mac with configuration as mentioned above.
Certificates and Provisioning profiles added.

When I try to run the app on device, it builds successfully and gets uploaded to iPhone but crashes. 
Same when I do the prod build and archive, from testflight on installation it crashes on startup.

Any suggestions, whats going on here ? No errors whatsoever
